rules_text: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. You gain 1 life. If that card was a creature card, you may have Bones to Flesh become a 3/3 Skeleton Beast creature until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]As Undue twisted the form to one he liked, it snapped back. “My poor child, you are malformed. Don't you worry though, I know just the fix.”[/i]
